ARABIC: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And say: "My Lord, land me in a blessed landing-place. You are the best Bringer to Land.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And say: 'O Lord, disembark me in a welcome place; You are the best of deliverers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And say: "My Lord! Make my landing a blessed landing, for You are the Best of those Who can cause people to land in safety."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Lord, grant us a blessed landing from the Ark; You are the One who provides the safest landing".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And pray, “My Lord! Cause me to alight at a blessed place – and You are the Best of all who bring to settle.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And say: `My Lord! Cause me to land at a blessed landing place, for You are the Best of those who bring to land."'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And say: O my Lord! cause me to disembark a blessed alighting, and Thou art the best to cause to alight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And say, "'O my Lord, do Thou harbour me in a blessed harbour, for Thou art the best of harbourers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And say: My Lord! Cause me to land at a blessed landing-place, for Thou art Best of all who bring to land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and say, 'My Lord, let me land with Your blessing in a blessed landing place. You alone can provide the best landings.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And say thou, my Lord! cause me to land at a landing blest, and thou art the Best of these who bring to land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And say, ‘‘My Lord! Land me with a blessed landing, for You are the best of those who bring ashore.’’ ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And say: "O my Lord! enable me to disembark with thy blessing: for Thou art the Best to enable (us) to disembark."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And say: "My Lord! Cause me to land at a blessed landing-place, for You are the Best of those who bring to land."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And say: 'Lord, let me land a blessed landing. You are the Best of harborers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And say, “My Lord, land me with a blessed landing, as you are the best of transporters.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:29] And say, upon disembarking from the ship: “My Lord, cause me to land with a landing (read munzalan as the verbal noun as well as the noun of place [for ‘landing’]; or manzilan as [meaning] the site of the landing) blessed, being that landing or place, for You are the best of all who bring to land” ’, that which has been mentioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And say) when you come off the ship: (My Lord! Cause me to land at a blessed landing place) blessed with water and trees, (for Thou art Best of all who bring to land) in the life of this world and in the Hereafter.
